multiple-choice.question: Let $n \geq 2$ be an integer. You are given $n$ beer bottles $B_1,B_2,\dots,B_n$ and two cider bottles $C_1$ and $C_2$. You choose a uniformly random 3-element subset of the set of these $n+2$ bottles. Define the random variable $X$ to be [defs] X = the number of cider bottles in the chosen subset. [/defs] What is the expected value $\mathbb{E}(X)$ of the random variable $X$?
